articles.author: Rakesh Patil
articles.title: Broader indices outperform; More than 100 smallcaps give double digit return - Moneycontrol
articles.description: For the short term, 22,620-22,630 will act as resistance for the Nifty. If the index sustains above 22,630, Nifty could attempt to break its all-time high of 22,776, says Hrishikesh Yedve, AVP Technical and Derivatives Research at Asit C. Mehta.
articles.content:
Broader indices continued to outperform the main indices in the week ended April 26 as mid and smallcap indices jumped 4 percent each with more than 100 small-cap stocks giving double-digit return.

articles.title: Airplane-Size Asteroid 2024 BJ Flies Closer Than The Moon In Orbit Animation - video Dailymotion - Dailymotion
articles.description: Asteroid 2024 BJ's closest approach to Earth will be about 220,000 miles (354,000 kilometers) way. The space rock is ~68 feet (21 meters) wide.   Credit: Space.com | animation: NASA/JPL-Caltech | edited by Steve Spaleta

articles.author: Diana Olick
articles.title: This startup helps plants talk to farmers, reducing pesticides and agricultural waste - CNBC
articles.description: InnerPlant's technology uses fluorescents in the plants, so the leaves emit a signal when they are in distress.
articles.content:
What if plants could talk to farmers and tell them when they're distressed? That would not only help the plants but also reduce the amount of agricultural waste that threatens the planet's health.
